TopicTitle: Development of the Kerbol system (Novas old dev pics)

Articles.Content:
exactly what has been said on the tin! Nova gave me permission to reupload his dev blog  Enjoy!

Edited January 26, 2016 by daniel l.

Very interesting pics man, thanks for sharing them.

 I just really wish Squad didn't can his amazing idea for the games Easter eggs.. It could have been so awesome. Squad the game needs more things like this!!! Planets are so BORING!

8 minutes ago, Majorjim said:

Very interesting pics man, thanks for sharing them.

 I just really wish Squad didn't can his amazing idea for the games Easter eggs.. It could have been so awesome. Squad the game needs more things like this!!! Planets are so BORING!

Ikr? Squad is so darn lazy! all they do is completely ignore features that we have been wanting for years and would take mere minutes to add, like clouds, a new sunflare, new skybox, ect ect ect.... And instead of making the game into the glorious thing its supposed to be they just fill it up with crap updates that no one really wanted. Not to be a hater but this game is going downhill. Especially since they abandoned the scifi theme and replaced it with the boring realistic stuff, THIS IS A GAME! not a NASA simulator squad!

Just now, daniel l. said:

Ikr? Squad is so darn lazy! all they do is completely ignore features that we have been wanting for years and would take mere minutes to add, like clouds, a new sunflare, new skybox, ect ect ect.... And instead of making the game into the glorious thing its supposed to be they just fill it up with crap updates that no one really wanted. Not to be a hater but this game is going downhill. Especially since they abandoned the scifi theme and replaced it with the boring realistic stuff, THIS IS A GAME! not a NASA simulator squad!

I agree partly. I think the game is about to get very interesting indeed. Squad are planning upgrades to the planets and major visual changed too. I just wish it had been done two years ago but i dont think it was possible then. I just hope for more things to explore other than a heightmap!

3 minutes ago, Majorjim said:

I agree partly. I think the game is about to get very interesting indeed. Squad are planning upgrades to the planets and major visual changed too. I just wish it had been done two years ago but i dont think it was possible then. I just hope for more things to explore other than a heightmap!

I hope so too, but then again... Remember all those promises that never came? GP2, Clouds, Interstellar, Ect.....
